Segment.name: ZD
Segment.comment: This segment is used to specify the transaction set to be canceled

Field.name: TransactionSetIdentifierCode
Field.comment: Code uniquely identifying a Transaction Set

Field.name: ShipmentIdentificationNumber
Field.comment: Identification number assigned to the shipment by the shipper that uniquely identifies the shipment from origin to ultimate destination and is not subject to modification; (Does not contain blanks or special characters)

Field.name: EquipmentInitial
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Field.name: TransactionReferenceNumber
Field.comment: Sender's assigned number for referenced transaction set

Field.name: TransactionReferenceDate
Field.comment: Date of referenced transaction set expressed in format CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: CorrectionIndicator
Field.comment: Code used to indicate that the transaction set contains information which corrects previous information

Field.name: EquipmentNumberCheckDigit
Field.comment: Number which designates the check digit applied to a piece of equipment
